qas.question: When was a coup d'etat staged?
Who assumed control of the country after the coup d'etat?

context: On the evening of <a0_0>12 April 2012<a0_0/>, <a1_0>members of the country's military<a1_0/> staged a coup d'état and arrested the interim president and a leading presidential candidate. Former <a4_0>vice chief of staff<a4_0/>, General <a2_0>Mamadu Ture Kuruma<a2_0/>, assumed control of the country in the transitional period and started negotiations with <a3_0>opposition parties<a3_0/>.
